text: DMK president M. Karunanidhi at the wedding of State BJP president Tamilisai Soundararajan's son on Wednesday. The who's who of Tamil Nadu politics, including former Union Ministers G.K. Vasan and Anbumani Ramadoss, DMDK leader Premalatha, DMK treasurer M.K. Stalin and TNCC president E.V.K.S. Elangovan and many others attended the event.
title: Special guests
